title: Fashion Show, Hotel Pierre, New York City

URC o on back, in pencil: [Lisette Model]
description: 2 women in black outfits and black hats seated at a table; woman on left has her head resting on her right hand and is wearing an oval brooch and diamond larriat necklace; woman on right has her arms folded on the table and is wearing a triple strand of pearls
